title: solr-ruby rewrite, jruby support
description:
Here is a re-write of the solr ruby client library. This is a simplified set of features, but really only missing the mapper/indexer code that's present in the current solr-ruby. Bringing those in will be the next step.

Tests are in test. Please read the README, there are instructions for running the tests.

A Solr 1.3 distribution is including for tests.


	find patch in file uploads "rewrite.1.patch"




	Matt Mitchell
